1: <pb/><t>Ajawaxel,</t> <t>ri c'o la pa ri caj,</t> <t>¡sibalaj utz</t> <t>u ya'ic maltioxinic che la</t> <t>xukuje' quibixoxic tak bix</t> <t>che u ya'ic k'ij la!</t>
2: <t>U ya'ic u tzijoxic ak'abil</t> <t>xukuje' chak'ab</t> <t>ri nimalaj lok'ok'ebal c'u'x la</t> <t>xukuje' ri jicomal la,</t>
3: <t>cuc' cok'ibal k'ojom ri c'o qui c'amal,</t> <t>ruc' chuch'ujil rok'ibal arp</t> <t>xukuje' nimalaj arp.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Oh Ajawaxel,</t> <t>yo'm la nu quicotemal</t> <t>cumal tak ri jastak ri e banom la.</t> <t>Ri e chac la quinquinojisaj</t> <t>che quicotemal.</t>
5: <t>Oh Ajawaxel,</t> <t>sibalaj e nimak jastak ri e banom la,</t> <t>sibalaj man cäch'obtaj ta</t> <t>ri chomanic la.</t>
6: <t>¡Xuwi ri man etal ta tzij</t> <t>man quecuin ta che u ch'obic!</t>
7: <t>We ri e banal tak etzelal</t> <t>xukuje' ri e itzel tak winak queq'uiyic</t> <t>e jacha' ri k'ayes,</t> <t>utz c'u quebelic,</t> <t>xa che u sachisaxic qui wäch</t> <t>chbe k'ij sak.</t>
8: <t>Ri lal c'ut Ajawaxel,</t> <t>lal c'o chicaj amak'el.</t>
9: <t>Jun jasach ri kastzij, Ajawaxel:</t> <t>ri e c'ulel la cäsach na qui wäch;</t> <t>conojel ri itzel tak winak quejabux na.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Lal cäya' la u wi' ri nu chuk'ab,</t> <t>jacha' ri e u chuk'ab jun ama' wacax,</t> <t>cak'ij c'u la c'oc'alaj cunabal</t> <t>pa nu jolom.</t>
11: <t>Quinwil c'u na</t> <t>ri quitzakic ri e nu c'ulel;</t> <t>¡quinta' na ri qui ch'ikowem</t> <t>we banal tak etzelal ri'!</t>
12: <pb/><t>Ri e utzalaj tak winak</t> <t>quecotz'ijan na e jacha' ri tut,</t> <t>queq'uiy na</t> <t>jacha' ri chacalte' pa ri Libano.</t>
13: <t>E tiquitoj</t> <t>chupam ri rachoch ri Ajawaxel;</t> <t>quecotz'ijan cho ri uwo ja</t> <t>rech ri rachoch ri ka Dios.</t>
14: <t>Pune' c'u e ri'jobinak chic,</t> <t>caquiya' na qui wäch;</t> <t>amak'el quetojtatic xukuje' e räx.</t>
15: <t>Cäquesaj c'u na</t> <t>u tzijol chi ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>ri to'l wech,</t> <t>are' suc' man c'o ta ri ma ta suq'uil ruc'.</t>
